originalTitle: Shanties in a Lagos lagoon: Bulldozed and burnt
title: Shanties in a Lagos lagoon: Bulldozed and burnt
content: Residents suspect the demolitions are aimed at gentrifying the waterfront in Nigeria's biggest city, but officials deny this.

originalTitle: Ghana suspends citizenship process for people of African descent
title: Ghana suspends citizenship process for people of African descent
content: Since 2016, those who can prove their ancestors came from Africa have been able to get Ghanaian nationality.

originalTitle: Trump threatens to sue Trevor Noah over Epstein joke at Grammys
title: Trump threatens to sue Trevor Noah over Epstein joke at Grammys
content: The US president labels Noah a "total loser" over a joke he told on stage during the awards ceremony.

originalTitle: Jobs, cash, loans: Can Bangladesh’s parties deliver on election promises?
title: Jobs, cash, loans: Can Bangladesh’s parties deliver on election promises?
content: From loans to scholarships for foreign studies, Bangladesh's main parties are wooing the youth. Will it work?

originalTitle: Musk merges SpaceX and xAI firms, plans for space-based AI data centres
title: Musk merges SpaceX and xAI firms, plans for space-based AI data centres
content: Musk says solar powered and space-based data centres are the only way to meet AI's burgeoning energy demands.

originalTitle: Moscow confirms Russian forces helped repel ISIL attack on Niger airport
title: Moscow confirms Russian forces helped repel ISIL attack on Niger airport
content: Moscow 'strongly condemns' attack on airport in the capital, Niamey, where 20 rebels were killed and 4 soldiers wounded.

originalTitle: Clintons agree to testify on Epstein as vote looms to hold them in contempt of Congress
title: Clintons agree to testify on Epstein as vote looms to hold them in contempt of Congress
content: The couple bows to the House Oversight Committee's demands after arguing for months that its subpoenas were invalid.

originalTitle: Son of Norway's crown princess goes on trial in tense moment for royal family
title: Son of Norway's crown princess goes on trial in tense moment for royal family
content: Marius Borg Høiby is accused of 38 charges including four counts of rape in one of the biggest cases in Norway for years.

originalTitle: After months of acrimony, Colombia's Petro is about to meet Trump
title: After months of acrimony, Colombia's Petro is about to meet Trump
content: Despite some recent cordiality, the Colombian and Americans leaders have long traded barbs and accusations.

title: 'Strong and smart' - have Liverpool signed 'next Van Dijk' in Jacquet?
content: Jeremy Jacquet will join Liverpool for £60m from Rennes in the summer - but why are the Reds signing him?

originalTitle: Just seven signings - the Premier League's quiet deadline day
title: Just seven signings - the Premier League's quiet deadline day
content: A low-key transfer deadline day ended with the fewest Premier League deals completed in a winter window. BBC Sport looks at the spending that was done, and examines why there was so little activity.

title: What might happen on WSL transfer deadline day?
content: The Women's Super League transfer window shuts on Tuesday - so what can we expect to happen on the final day of business?
